channel.title: Firefox on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Firefox on TLDRBins

item.title: Firefox
item.description: Browse History Windows # Locate sqlite $firefoxProfile = Get-ChildItem -Path "$env:APPDATA\Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles\" -Directory | Where-Object { $_.Name -like "*.default-release*" }; $historyDb = Join-Path $firefoxProfile.FullName "places.sqlite"; $historyDb Extract Saved Passwords firefox_decrypt firepwd # Auto detect path python3 firefox_decrypt.py # Specify path python3 firefox_decrypt.py /<PATH>/profiles.ini/ Ref: firefox_decrypt # With key4.db, logins.json in the same directory python3 firepwd.py Ref: firepwd
